gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `ReceivablesFromBanks` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `ReceivablesFromBanks` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `ReceivablesFromBanksMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesFromCreditInstitutionsMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReceivablesFromBanksEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesFromCreditInstitutionsMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReceivablesFromBanksEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesFromCreditInstitutionsMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReceivablesFromBanksStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesFromCreditInstitutionsMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReceivablesFromBanksStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesFromCreditInstitutionsMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReceivablesFromBanksMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesFromCreditInstitutionsMovementBanks_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ReceivablesFromBanksMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ReceivablesFromBanksMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesFromCreditInstitutionsMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ReceivablesFromBanksMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesFromCreditInstitutionsMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ReceivablesFromBanksMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesFromCreditInstitutionsMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesFromBanksMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesFromCreditInstitutionsMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesFromBanksMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesFromCreditInstitutionsMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesFromBanksMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedReceivablesFromCreditInstitutionsMovementBanks_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfReceivablesFromBanksMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
